pageTitle: 1959 PONTIAC CATALINA Information Specifications Resources Pictures
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {516=In 1959 the Chieftain lines name changed to Catalina. For 1959, the Pontiac Catalina received major styling changes. They were lower, longer, and had more interior room. They had a new twin grille theme to go along with the twin fin rear fenders. The Catalina featured a V-contoured hood, increased glass area, and flat rear over-hanging roofs on the four-door Vista hardtop.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {17228=K - Gulfstream Blue Metallic Lucite® Code - 2930L Dulux® Code - 181-92945, 16346=D - Dundee Green Metallic Lucite® Code - 2933L Dulux® Code - 181-92725, 16651=C - Cameo Ivory Lucite® Code - 2697L Dulux® Code - 93-91249}
textBeforeTable: 1959 Pontiac Catalina Production Numbers and Specifications   In 1959 the Chieftain lines name changed to Catalina. For 1959, the Pontiac Catalina received major styling changes. They were lower, longer, and had more interior room. They had a new twin grille theme to go along with the twin fin rear fenders. The Catalina featured a V-contoured hood, increased glass area, and flat rear over-hanging roofs on the four-door Vista hardtop. 1959 Pontiac Catalina document.write(''); if(typeof(tile) == "undefined"){var tile = 1} else {tile++} if(typeof(dcopt) == "undefined"){var dcopt = "dcopt=ist;"} else {var dcopt = ""} if(typeof(cachebuster) == "undefined"){var cachebuster = Math.floor(Math.random()*10000000000)}
